description: This bid solicitation is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Categories of the SA: Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products; Product Category 5 - Ancillary and Lighting Products Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to 9700 Jasper, Edmonton, Alberta by March 31st, 2024. This covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the PSIB stream of Suppliers (SA holders).

full_summary:
=================================================================



### Tender Overview



#### Competitive Procurement Process
The Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is undertaking an open competitive procurement process for the supply and installation of office furniture to its office located at 9700 Jasper, Edmonton, Alberta.



#### Tender Details

*   **Notice Reference:** cb-650-81793258
*   **Solicitation Number:** CIC-157310
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 10, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 15, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
*   **Purchase Category:** Furniture



#### Tender Requirements



*   The successful contractor will provide and install office furniture, including:
    *   Freestanding height-adjustable desks and tables
    *   Ancillary and lighting products
*   The delivery and installation of the furniture will occur at the IRCC office at 9700 Jasper, Edmonton, Alberta
*   The contract will end on March 31, 2024


#### Amendment Details



*   Amendment 001 has extended the bid solicitation period.
*   Amendment 002 is released to modify the Basis of Payment in Annex A



#### Contact Information



*   For more information, please contact:
    *   Eve-Marie Leduc
    *   Email: [IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca](mailto:IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (000) 000-0000



#### Supporting Documents



*   The following documents are available for download:
    *   Notice of Proposed Procurement 
    *   Request for Bid Template (English)
    *   Request for Bid Template (French)
    *   Amendment 001 (English)
    *   Amendment 001 (French)
    *   Amendment 002 (English)
    *   Amendment 002 (French)
    *   FAQ Round 1 (English)
    *   FAQ Round 1 (French)



#### Geographic Region and Language



*   The tender is focused on Edmonton, Alberta, and will be conducted in English and French, in accordance with the [Official Languages Act](https://www.canada.ca/en/public-service-commission/services/languages/attacholanguageschanges.html).
